titleStmt.title: Carolus II. D.G. Angliæ. Scotiæ. Franciæ. & Hiberniæ Rex, etc. etc.
titleStmt.author: Ogilby, John, 1600-1676.
Williamson, Peter, fl. 1660, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Williams, at the Crowne in St. Pauls church yard,

notesStmt.note: A portrait of Charles II, engraved by Peter Williamson, with an inscription in verse by John Ogilby.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Crowne in St. Pauls church yard
